title: "Practice A"

*(for lessons on R for mathematics and vectorized operations)*

1. Make this calculation using R math operators

$$ \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}}e^{-\frac{1}{2}(\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma})^2}$$
Where: $\pi$ = 3.14, $e$ = 2.718, $\mu$ = 50, $\sigma$ = 5, $x$ = 20

2. Repeat this calculation where 
$x$ = {10, 30, 40, 50, 60}
